__e: Surely you can't say it's because a half dozen stealth drones are soon to be over London and under terrorist control.
And that was with six drones in the air twelve hours a day.
You've got one of their drones at your house.
Those drones are not cheap to build.
Look, I don't expect you to change overnight, but try to remember that we are not just a bunch of drones.
We'll have control of the drones soon.
